characteristics: Clear hierarchy with multiple weight variations
usage_patterns: Equipment names in bold, prominent display
Benefit statements in clear, readable sizes

page_structure.header: Professional navigation with clear product categories
page_structure.content_areas: Grid-based equipment showcases with technical details

style: Multiple angles and close-up technical views

davidov_implementation.recommendation: Incorporate professional blue tones for medical credibility
Utilize clean white backgrounds for equipment showcases

davidov_implementation.usage: Equipment details, technical parameters, professional credentials

equipment_showcases: Grid-based equipment presentation with high-quality photography
Technical specification tables for each device

photography_approach: High-quality equipment photography with professional lighting
visual_consistency: Consistent professional presentation across all equipment
Medical-grade quality emphasis in all visuals

differentiation_opportunities.strategy: Add personal branding elements while maintaining professionalism

color_usage_rules: Professional blue for trust and medical credibility
Clean white for clarity and medical environment association
Technical gray for sophistication and precision
Minimal accent colors for professional focus
typography_recommendations: Bold, professional fonts for equipment names and headers
Clear, readable fonts for technical specifications
imagery_standards: High-quality, professional photography for all equipment
